What<S>5101</S> shall we say<S>2046</S> then<S>3767</S>? Shall we continue<S>1961</S> in sin<S>266</S>, that<S>2443</S> grace<S>5485</S> may abound<S>4121</S>?
God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>. How<S>4459</S> shall we, that<S>3748</S> are dead<S>599</S> to sin<S>266</S>, live<S>2198</S> any longer<S>2089</S> therein<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>?
<S>2228</S> Know ye not<S>50</S>, that so<S>3754</S> many of us<S>3745</S> as were baptized<S>907</S> into<S>1519</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> were baptized<S>907</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> death<S>2288</S>? <sup>were: or, are</sup> <sup>were: or, are</sup>
Therefore<S>3767</S> we are buried with<S>4916</S> him<S>846</S> by<S>1223</S> baptism<S>908</S> into<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S>: that<S>2443</S> like as<S>5618</S> Christ<S>5547</S> was raised up<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S> by<S>1223</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of the Father<S>3962</S>, even so<S>3779</S> we<S>2249</S> also<S>2532</S> should walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> newness<S>2538</S> of life<S>2222</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> we have been<S>1096</S> planted together<S>4854</S> in the likeness<S>3667</S> of his<S>846</S> death<S>2288</S>, we shall be<S>2071</S> also<S>235</S> <S>2532</S> in the likeness of his resurrection<S>386</S>:
Knowing<S>1097</S> this<S>5124</S>, that<S>3754</S> our<S>2257</S> old<S>3820</S> man<S>444</S> is crucified with<S>4957</S> him, that<S>2443</S> the body<S>4983</S> of sin<S>266</S> might be destroyed<S>2673</S>, that henceforth<S>3371</S> we<S>2248</S> should<S>1398</S> not<S>3371</S> serve<S>1398</S> sin<S>266</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he that is dead<S>599</S> is freed<S>1344</S> from<S>575</S> sin<S>266</S>. <sup>freed: Gr. justified</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> we be dead<S>599</S> with<S>4862</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, we believe<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> we shall<S>4800</S> also<S>2532</S> live<S>4800</S> with him<S>846</S>:
Knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> Christ<S>5547</S> being raised<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S> dieth<S>599</S> no more<S>3765</S>; death<S>2288</S> hath<S>2961</S> no more<S>3765</S> dominion over<S>2961</S> him<S>846</S>.
For<S>3739</S> <S>1063</S> in that he died<S>599</S>, he died<S>599</S> unto sin<S>266</S> once<S>2178</S>: but<S>1161</S> in that<S>3739</S> he liveth<S>2198</S>, he liveth<S>2198</S> unto God<S>2316</S>.
Likewise<S>3779</S> reckon<S>3049</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> to be<S>1511</S> dead<S>3498</S> indeed<S>3303</S> unto sin<S>266</S>, but<S>1161</S> alive<S>2198</S> unto God<S>2316</S> through<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>.
Let<S>936</S> not<S>3361</S> sin<S>266</S> therefore<S>3767</S> reign<S>936</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> mortal<S>2349</S> body<S>4983</S>, that<S>1519</S> ye should obey<S>5219</S> it<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the lusts<S>1939</S> thereof<S>846</S>.
Neither<S>3366</S> yield ye<S>3936</S> your<S>5216</S> members<S>3196</S> as instruments<S>3696</S> of unrighteousness<S>93</S> unto sin<S>266</S>: but<S>235</S> yield<S>3936</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> unto God<S>2316</S>, as<S>5613</S> those that are alive<S>2198</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> members<S>3196</S> as instruments<S>3696</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S> unto God<S>2316</S>. <sup>instruments: Gr. arms, or, weapons</sup>
For<S>1063</S> sin<S>266</S> shall<S>2961</S> not<S>3756</S> have dominion over<S>2961</S> you<S>5216</S>: for<S>1063</S> ye are<S>2075</S> not<S>3756</S> under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>, but<S>235</S> under<S>5259</S> grace<S>5485</S>.
What<S>5101</S> then<S>3767</S>? shall we sin<S>264</S>, because<S>3754</S> we are<S>2070</S> not<S>3756</S> under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>, but<S>235</S> under<S>5259</S> grace<S>5485</S>? God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>.
Know ye<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S>, that<S>3754</S> to whom<S>3739</S> ye yield<S>3936</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> servants<S>1401</S> to<S>1519</S> obey<S>5218</S>, his servants<S>1401</S> ye are<S>2075</S> to whom<S>3739</S> ye obey<S>5219</S>; whether<S>2273</S> of sin<S>266</S> unto<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S>, or<S>2228</S> of obedience<S>5218</S> unto<S>1519</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>?
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> be thanked<S>5485</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye were<S>2258</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of sin<S>266</S>, but<S>1161</S> ye have obeyed<S>5219</S> from<S>1537</S> the heart<S>2588</S> that form<S>5179</S> of doctrine<S>1322</S> which<S>1519</S> <S>3739</S> was delivered you<S>3860</S>. <sup>which: Gr. whereto ye were delivered</sup>
Being<S>1659</S> then<S>1161</S> made free<S>1659</S> from<S>575</S> sin<S>266</S>, ye became the servants<S>1402</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S>.
I speak<S>3004</S> after the manner of men<S>442</S> because<S>1223</S> of the infirmity<S>769</S> of your<S>5216</S> flesh<S>4561</S>: for<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> ye have yielded<S>3936</S> your<S>5216</S> members<S>3196</S> servants<S>1401</S> to uncleanness<S>167</S> and<S>2532</S> to iniquity<S>458</S> unto<S>1519</S> iniquity<S>458</S>; even so<S>3779</S> now<S>3568</S> yield<S>3936</S> your<S>5216</S> members<S>3196</S> servants<S>1401</S> to righteousness<S>1343</S> unto<S>1519</S> holiness<S>38</S>.
For<S>1063</S> when<S>3753</S> ye were<S>2258</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of sin<S>266</S>, ye were<S>2258</S> free<S>1658</S> from righteousness<S>1343</S>. <sup>from: Gr. to righteousness</sup>
What<S>5101</S> <S>3767</S> fruit<S>2590</S> had ye<S>2192</S> then<S>5119</S> in<S>1909</S> those things whereof<S>3739</S> ye are<S>1870</S> now<S>3568</S> ashamed<S>1870</S>? for<S>1063</S> the end<S>5056</S> of those things<S>1565</S> is death<S>2288</S>.
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> being made free<S>1659</S> from<S>575</S> sin<S>266</S>, and<S>1161</S> become servants<S>1402</S> to God<S>2316</S>, ye have<S>2192</S> your<S>5216</S> fruit<S>2590</S> unto<S>1519</S> holiness<S>38</S>, and<S>1161</S> the end<S>5056</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the wages<S>3800</S> of sin<S>266</S> is death<S>2288</S>; but<S>1161</S> the gift<S>5486</S> of God<S>2316</S> is eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S> through<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>.
